tasks.label: PySpark: run current file on cluster
tasks.command: docker compose run --rm -p 4040:4040 -p 5678:5678 -v "${workspaceFolder}:/opt/app" spark-submit bash -lc 'PYSPARK_DRIVER_PYTHON=python PYSPARK_DRIVER_PYTHON_OPTS="-m debugpy --listen 0.0.0.0:5678 --wait-for-client" spark-submit --master spark://spark-master:7077 /opt/app/${relativeFile}'

tasks.label: Spark SQL: run current .sql file
tasks.command: docker compose run --rm -p 4040:4040 -v "${workspaceFolder}:/opt/app" spark-submit bash -lc 'spark-sql --master spark://spark-master:7077 -f /opt/app/${relativeFile}'

tasks.label: Spark shell (Scala) against cluster
tasks.command: docker compose run --rm -p 4040:4040 spark-submit spark-shell --master spark://spark-master:7077
